snippet.title: Animating a Frog Prince | Livestream Archive
snippet.description:
I want the videos on this channel to be fairly high effort but I got a lot done on a twitch stream the other day so I cut out a section that made sense for a video. I might do this more often if people enjoy them but if not I'll stick to polished stuff :D

I'm mostly uploading it because a dev I look up to posts archives of their streams sometimes, I re-watch them whilst working cause they're super inspiring and make game dev look approachable, he was one of the devs on Celeste so if you like seeing how pixel platformers are made then absolutely check out his stuff!! https://www.youtube.com/@noelfb/videos

- socials
twitter - https://twitter.com/bumbleborn
twitch - https://www.twitch.tv/bumbleborn
website - https://bumbleborn.com/
my game Echo's Climb (Wishlisting totally helps) - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1986400/Echos_Climb/

- Music (I think, can't remember exactly what I had on)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-Siljd9PwKs
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IQIg5wHUiXo

#indiegame #gamedev #playdate #livestream
